sentences.sContent: What of the affiliate groups or the "network of networks"?
sentences.sContent_eng: What of the affiliate groups or the "network of networks"?
sentences.sCn: 那些附属组织或者称“网络的网络”又将怎样？

sentences.sContent: Afterwards, data can be shared between and among the root and affiliate registries with the assurance that each given key partition is unique.
sentences.sContent_eng: Afterwards, data can be shared between and among the root and affiliate registries with the assurance that each given key partition is unique.
sentences.sCn: 这样，在确保每一个给定的键分区是唯一的情况下，根注册中心和附属注册中心之间就可以共享数据了。

synos.tran: 使附属；接纳；使紧密联系

words.tran: 友好关系；加入；联盟；从属关系
使隶属；加入（affiliate的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: if a group or organization affiliates to or with another larger one, it forms a close connection with it
